full_text: Page 2812 MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER H DATE: 08/04/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 12:30- 1:00 AM 1:00-1:30 AM 1:30-2:00 AM 2:00-2:30 AM 2:30-3:00 AM 3:00-3:30 AM 3:30-4:00 AM 4:00-4:30 AM 4:30-5:00 AM 5:00 -5:30 AM 5:30-6:00 AM 6:00-6:30 AM 6:30-7:00 AM 7:00-7:30 AM 7:30-8:00 AM 810 842 112 140 210 241 310 340 411 442 510 542 611 642 714 740 1013 1243 113 141 211 242 311 341 412 443 511 543 612 643 715 741 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 8:30- 9:00 AM 9:00-9:30 AM 9:30-10:00 AM 10:00-10:30 AM 10:30-11:00 AM 11:00-11:30 AM 11:30-12:00 AM 12:00-12:30 PM 12:30- 1:00 PM 1:00-1:30 PM 1:30-2:00 PM 2:00-2:30 PM 2:30-3:00 PM 3:00-3:30 PM 3:30-4:00 PM 811 846 911 942 1017 1043 1111 1151 1211 1242 111 144 211 243 311 344 813 848 913 944 1014 1043 1113 1153 123 1244 113 146 213 245 313 346 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 4:30-5:00 PM 5:00 -5:30 PM 5:30-6:00 PM 6:00-6:30 PM 6:30-7:00 PM 7:00-7:30 PM 7:30-8:00 PM 8:00-8:30 PM 8:30- 9:00 PM 9:00-9:30 PM 9:30-10:00 PM 10:00-10:30 PM 10:30-11:00 PM 11:00-11:30 PM 11:30-12:00 PM 11 442 512 540 610 811 840 940 842 910 942 1011 1041 1111 1138 12 443 513 541 611 813 841 941 843 913 943 1012 1042 1111 1139 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) CAPTAIN DOJ-OGR-00026468

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten entries in a table format, with some redacted information marked as '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'. The document appears to be a check sheet for monitoring inmates in a special housing unit.
